text:
I have the following issue where in Atom (Juno), there are ambiguous functions between Base and Core, which is not the case when I run Julia from the command line.
in the command prompt:
```julia> using Test

julia> detect_ambiguities(Base,Core)
Tuple{Method,Method}[]```
in Atom Juno:

elements.text:

in the command prompt:

julia> using Test

julia> detect_ambiguities(Base,Core)
